47082.summary: Some customers in North Red Deer are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
47082.title: Feb 22 – Red Deer (North) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
